content: one row for 1 5 long then join to knit in the round again this will leave you a thumb hole continue knit 2 / c3 decrease 4 sts evenly then knit another 1 5 / 2 bind off you may adjust the length of this portion to fit your fingers thumb pick up 14/ 16 sts along the thumb opening knit in rounds 1 5 to 2 bind off consider knit a matching scarf it takes about 400 yard for 8 wide 5-6ʼ long scarf how about the school colors for those cold friday night football games
